text: Archbishop Raul Nicolau Gonçalves (15 June 1927 – 1 July 2022)As spelt in the documents of the Vatican and in the official archived site Patriarches of the Archdiocese archivedate = 15 September 2013. was an Indian prelate. He was the first Catholic Goan to be Archbishop of Goa and Patriarch of the East Indies.Vaz, J. Clement. Profiles of Eminent Goans, past and Present. New Delhi: Concept Pub., 1997. Print. p. 53 He was the archbishop emeritus of Goa. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Raul Nicolau Gonçalves
